mentions.candidate: Tam Smith, Tam Smith & Stewart Hosie MP, Tam Smith declared 'I look forward to achieving this victory when Gordon Brown's majority is toppled over'
mentions.tacticalSituation: While Labour and the Tories fight each other, the SNP is focusing on tackling local issues.

politicalExperience.role: Linlithgow & East Falkirk Westminster Constituency SNP Branch Convener
SNP Candidate in the 1992 Westminster General Election for Linlithgow

quotes.text: Tam Smith is the only candidate who can beat the Labour candidate and the sitting MP Gordon Brown. With Labour and the Tories tied up in securing English votes, we now have a window of opportunity to increase Scotland's voice at Westminster by electing Tam.

images.caption: Tam Smith & Stewart Hosie MP putting Linlithgow & East Falkirk Centre Stage at SNP Conference.
Tam Smith on The Campaign Trail

leaflet.additionalNotes: The SNP are gaining ground here in Linlithgow and East Falkirk constituency.
